overview: Across America, violent crime rips communities apart. Loved ones are murdered. Young adults are sent to prison for life. Families lose children on both sides.  For decades, this cycle of violence and punishment has persisted without remedy. Now, one group is taking dramatic action to encourage redemption and transformation in the boldest way possible...by facilitating meetings between offenders and victims of violent crimes.  These are the stories of the Merciful Minds.
title: Merciful Minds
